note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A demo of the todo application using puremvc (native) and dojo (puremvc classes are all dojo).  PureMVC is loaded from the puremvc library file but all implementations of Mediators, Proxies, Commands are done with Dojo classes.
body:
### puremvc-js-dojo-todo:
A demo of the todo application using puremvc (native) and dojo (puremvc classes are all dojo).  PureMVC is loaded from the puremvc library file but all implementations of Mediators, Proxies, Commands are done with Dojo classes.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
```
name: puremvc-js-dojo-todo
